summary: Tested text contrast and readability across 5 different themes (neon, party, modern, ocean, classic) in the public gallery. All text elements are readable with proper contrast on both dark and light themes.
critical_code_review_comments: getContrastTextColor() function correctly calculates luminance and returns appropriate text color (#ffffff for dark backgrounds, #1a1a1a for light backgrounds)
getSubtleTextColor() properly creates rgba values with opacity for secondary text
All major text elements in PublicGallery.jsx use dynamic contrast functions instead of hardcoded colors
context_for_next_testing_agent: Text contrast implementation verified working across all theme types. Key functions: getContrastTextColor(), getSubtleTextColor() in themes.js. Public gallery URLs tested: /g/465f44a9 (neon), /g/d13a352c (party), /g/d11a0199 (modern), /g/471d4bbf (ocean), /g/e1955850 (classic).

neon_theme_dark.details: Navigation, photo count, section headers, footer all readable with white text on dark purple background

party_theme_light.details: Navigation, photo count, section headers, footer all readable with dark text on light pink background

modern_theme_dark.details: Navigation, photo count, section headers, contributor names, footer all readable with white text on dark blue background

ocean_theme_light.details: Navigation, title, section headers, contributor names, download button all readable with appropriate contrast

classic_theme_light.details: Navigation, title, footer all readable with black text on white background

download_dropdown_contrast.details: Download modal text is readable on both party (light) and modern (dark) themes

footer_text_readability.details: Footer text 'Thank you for being part of this special day' and copyright text readable on all themes

section_headers_readability.details: Section headers like 'Highlights', 'Guest Uploads', photo section names all readable

contributor_name_readability.details: Contributor names (e.g., 'by RURAL CONCEPT', 'by LESS REAL MOMENTS') visible with appropriate subtle color

button_text_contrast.details: Download button, Share Your Photos button, View All Photos button text all readable with proper contrast

themes_verified: ocean (light - white background with blue accents)
classic (light - white background with black text)
text_elements_verified: Navigation bar text (photographer name, photo count, upload button)
Section headers (Highlights, photo sections, Guest Uploads)
Footer text ('Thank you for being part of this special day')
